definitions.definition: One who attends; one who works with or watches over something.
definitions.example: Give your keys to the parking attendants and they will park your car for you.

definitions.definition: One who owes a duty or service to another.

definitions.example: They promoted him to supervisor, with all the attendant responsibilities and privileges.

definitions.definition: Depending on, or owing duty or service to.
definitions.example: the widow attendant to the heir
